content:
Curriculum Master Informatics - TUM - TUM School of Computation, Information and Technology

Curriculum Master Informatics
Curriculum Master Informatics
Based on the study plans, you can see how the four semesters of the Master's program are composed. For details on the courses, please click directly on the modules in the table. In addition to the modules listed in the plans, modules from the area of Support Electives and an Interdisciplinary Project must be taken.
Curriculum Master Informatics
----------------------------------------

Examination Rules from WS 2018/19
Curriculum Master Informatics > Examination Rules from WS 2018/19
Curriculum in TUMonline for start from 2023/24
The following rules apply to students who started in the winter term 2018/19 or later:
WS22-23_16030_FPSO_Presenation_en.pdf
Table (Curriculum Master Informatics > Examination Rules from WS 2018/19):
Sem | Credits | InformaticsMethodology and Knowledge |   | InformaticsPractice |   | InformaticsResearch
27* | Elective Course Catalog Informatics (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/ee/ui/ca2/app/desktop/#/pl/ui/$ctx/wbstpcs.showSpoTree?$ctx=design=ca2;header=max;lang=en&pSJNr=1615&pStStudiumNr=&pStartSemester=&pStpStpNr=4731) |   |   |   |  
21* | Elective Course Catalog Informatics  (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/ee/ui/ca2/app/desktop/#/pl/ui/$ctx/wbstpcs.showSpoTree?$ctx=design=ca2;header=max;lang=en&pSJNr=1615&pStStudiumNr=&pStartSemester=&pStpStpNr=4731) |   | IN2106 Master's Practicum, (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/WBMODHB.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=487749) |   |  
20* | Elective Course Catalog Informatics (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/ee/ui/ca2/app/desktop/#/pl/ui/$ctx/wbstpcs.showSpoTree?$ctx=design=ca2;header=max;lang=en&pSJNr=1615&pStStudiumNr=&pStartSemester=&pStpStpNr=4731) |   |   |   |  
IN2107 Master's Seminar, (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/WBMODHB.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=1248712&pOrgNr=14189) |   |   |   |  
Elective Course Catalog Informatics (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/ee/ui/ca2/app/desktop/#/pl/ui/$ctx/wbstpcs.showSpoTree?$ctx=design=ca2;header=max;lang=en&pSJNr=1615&pStStudiumNr=&pStartSemester=&pStpStpNr=4731) | or | IN2257 Additional Master's Practicum  (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/WBMODHB.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=487749) | or | IN2169 Guided Research Project (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/WBMODHB.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=458261&pOrgNr=14189)
30 | IN2108 Master’s thesis (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/WBMODHB.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=457006&pOrgNr=14189)

Profile building*** 10 Credits to choose from:
Modules from the Elective Course Catalog Informatics **amounting to 10 credits
IN2257 Additional Master's Practicum ****, 10 credits
IN2175 Advanced Master's Practicum,
10 credits
IN2169 Guided Research Project,
10 credits
* additionally in the 1st to 3rd semester: Modules Support Electives (6 credits) and an Interdisciplinary Project (16 credits).
** Theory modules: at least 10 credits from "Theory" modules must be earned. The "Theory" modules can be found in the study tree in the respective subject area under Theory. These modules can also be assigned to different subject areas and do not have to be in the focus area or one of the other two subject areas.
Area of specialization with at least 18 credits and two supplemental areas with at least 8 credits each, you can take another 9 credits (or 19 credits, see profiling) in any subject areas. Excess credits in the three chosen subject areas automatically count towards the "free elective".
*** These variants of the study plan are used for profile formation (research, practice (in-depth) or fundamentals).
**** Any Master's internship that is announced in TUMonline with IN2106 and has not yet been brought in as a Master's internship can be selected as an additional Master's internship.
Structure MS.c. Informatics from October 2018
Examination Rules from WS 2018/19
----------------------------------------

Studienbeginn ab Wintersemester 2016/17
Curriculum Master Informatics > Studienbeginn ab Wintersemester 2016/17
Studienplan ab Wintersemester 2016/17 in TUMonline
Folien FPSO Vorstellung von SoSe 1018
Table (Curriculum Master Informatics > Studienbeginn ab Wintersemester 2016/17):

24* | Wahlfachkatalog Informatik** (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/wbstpcs.showSpoTree?pStpStpNr=4594) |   |   |   |  
24* | Wahlfachkatalog Informatik** (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/wbstpcs.showSpoTree?pStpStpNr=4594) |   | IN2106 Master-Praktikum (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/WBMODHB.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=487749) |   |  
20* | Wahlfachkatalog Informatik** (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/wbstpcs.showSpoTree?pStpStpNr=4594) |   |   |   |  
IN2107 Master-Seminar (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/WBMODHB.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=1248712&pOrgNr=14189) |   |   |   |  
Wahlfachkatalog Informatik** (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/wbstpcs.showSpoTree?pStpStpNr=4594) | oder | IN2257 Zusätzliches Master-Praktikum**** (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/WBMODHB.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=487749) | oder | IN2169 Forschungsarbeit unter Anleitung (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/WBMODHB.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=458261&pOrgNr=14189)
30 | IN2108 Master’s Thesis (https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/WBMODHB.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=457006&pOrgNr=14189)

Profilbildung*** 10 Credits zu wählen aus:
Module aus dem Wahlfachkatalog Informatik** 			10 Credits
IN2257 Zusätzliches Master-Praktikum**** 			10 Credits
IN2175 Vertiefendes Praktikum 			10 Credits
IN2169 Forschungsarbeit unter Anleitung 			10 Credits
* zusätzlich im 1. bis 3. Semester: Module Überfachliche Grundlagen (6 Credits) und ein Interdisziplinäres Projekt in einem Anwendungsfach (16 Credits)
** Theorie: eines der als Schwerpunktgebiet oder Ergänzungsgebiet gewählten Fachgebiete muss ein Theoriegebiet („Formale Methoden und ihre Anwendungen“ (FMA) oder „Algorithmen und Wissenschaftliches Rechnen“ (AWR)) sein.
Schwerpunktgebiet mit mindestens 18 Credits und zwei Ergänzungsgebiete mit jeweils mindestens 8 Credits, weitere 9 Credits (bzw. 19 Credits, siehe Profilbildung) können Sie in beliebigen Fachgebieten erbringen. Überschüssige Credits in den drei gewählten Fachgebieten zählen automatisch zu dem "freien Wahlbereich".
*** Diese Varianten des Studienplans dienen der Profilbildung (Forschung, Praxis (verteieft) bzw. Grundlagen).
**** Als zusätzliches Master-Praktikum kann jedes Master-Praktikum, das in TUMonline mit IN2106 angekündigt wird und noch nicht als Master-Praktikum eingebracht wurde, gewählt werden.
Schaubild MSc Informatik ab Oktober 2016
Studienbeginn ab Wintersemester 2016/17
----------------------------------------
